subtitleNullable: This dataset contains images taken by my dashcam to detect vehicles and signs!
descriptionNullable:
## Context
This dataset was collected by myself using the dashcam I installed in my car. The dataset contains images gathered from hours of footage, and will be updated as frequently as possible.

## Content
The dataset mostly contains labeled cars, bikes and pedestrians, but also the following:
- Traffic lights (red, green, yellow);
- Trucks
- A lot of different signs (yield, speed limits, roundabouts, etc)
For now, there are too many under-represented classes. This will improve with the updates that are coming. I'm gathering a lot of footage by driving every day. The footage used is from the daytime, nighttime, overcast and rainy days.
title: Vehicle + Sign detection
